about_the_game:
Do Not Press The Button (To Delete The Multiverse) is a first-person exploration game featuring comedic narration by The Developer, who questions, taunts, and tests you at every turn. You shouldn't press the button, but you’ll want to. You’ll have control—and none at all. The fate of the multiverse is in your hands… or is it?

Essay email: TheseusGamesStudios@gmail.com

Inspired by classic narrative-driven games, Do Not Press The Button (To Delete The Multiverse) challenges the conventions of storytelling and player agency, inviting players into a universe where every action leads to unexpected (and often humorous) consequences.

This is Theseus Games' third title, and by now, we've specialized in the advanced field of wackiness. After all, our previous releases include Pizza Synthwave and Be a Rock. For a more complete and in-depth understanding of what Do Not Press The Button is, check out the free demo.

In this game you will have the choice of how to play and what to do, it’s about you and your wacky shenanigans against The Developer.

Compete against other players in the global leaderbord as we are looking for the person that can set the record for not pressing the button the longest. Don't forget to annoy The Developer along the way! Estimated gameplay time: up to 1 billion years (or however long human civilization lasts).

Features

- Global leaderboard: compete against other players;

- Fun activities such as:

> play board games against the A.I. Robo-Spheres.

> uncover secret areas with secret content;

> the sportsball room;

> the box building room;

> the dark humor room;

> the "Meaning of human existence" room;

> interact with random physical objects inside the facility;

- Comedic narration and fun story telling;

- The Room with all the people that want to hang out with you;

- Secret Do Not Press The Button (tm) lore (tm);

- Hundreds of voice lines;

- Annoying The Developer;

- Wacky Multiverses;

- Accessibility: we value accessibility and strive to ensure that everyone can enjoy our game, regardless of any hearing impairments they

may have. That's why we've made sure that every voice line in the game features subtitles, so that all players can fully immerse themselves in the experience.

Look, we're not asking you to solve complex equations here. You just have to not press a button. It's an average job for an average person. You've trained all your life for this moment. Go in there and shine my little mediocre moth!

P.S. "I have no idea what I'm doing with my life anymore!" - The Dev

name: Do Not Press The Button (Or You'll Delete The Multiverse)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8 and Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i3-3250 / AMD FX-6350
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 650 Ti 2GB or better / AMD Radeon™ R9 270x or better
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 8 and Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-3770 at 3.4 GHz / AMD FX-8350 at 4.0 GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 970 4GB or better / AMD Radeon™ R9 280x 3GB or better
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: A first-person, narrative-driven game featuring The Developer, who questions, taunts, and tests you at every turn. You shouldn’t press the button, but you’ll want to. You will have control, and you will have none. Power is in your hands... or is it? Inspired by classic narrative driven games.
supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
